title: On Sourdough Starters and How Domesticity Became a Luxury, with Jaimee Edwards
itunes:title: On Sourdough Starters and How Domesticity Became a Luxury, with Jaimee Edwards
description:
What is hiding behind your Instagram photos of perfectly baked sourdough bread? First of all, all of the labor and time and knowledge it took to create it. Second, the strained and in some places broken food supply chain during the pandemic. And third, all of the money and countertop space that some have but most do not. Cookbook writer and teacher Jaimee Edwards joins Jessa to discuss how domesticity became a status symbol and a luxury, and how to restore the transmission of domestic knowledge.
